sentences.sentence: Please send your letters toletters@independent.co.ukThe latest handout is£23m to Britain's shellfish industrywhose exports have become entangled inred tape.

No doubt, for the same reason, more of ourmoneywill be necessary to rescue the Northern Irish haulage industry among others.Boris Johnson's pipe dream of a go-it-alone globalBritainhas similarities to the jingoism of another Tory prime minister,Benjamin Disraeli, who extended the “Empire of England” beyond what Britain could sustain.

His imperialism, during a time of recession, resulted in a substantial budget deficit and, in sowing the seeds for future conflicts, hastened our decline as a world power.Roger HindsSurreyVaccine timelineDid anybody notice the goalposts moving?Shaun Lintern reportsthat thegovernmentis forbidding hospitals to administer a second Covid-19 vaccine dose within 12 weeks of the first.
So it has changed from a 12-week maximum to 12-weeks minimum.

And we still don't know if 12 weeks makes sense at all.David WatsonHenley-on-ThamesBrexit job lossesThe impact ofBrexiton the fishing industry and on meat producers has hit the headlines daily and perhaps the government is correct in insisting these are short-term issues, which will be fixed.Spare a thought for those of us who run au pair agencies.

Our businesses ceased at 11pm on 31 December and we have gone from having busy, viable agencies to no possibility of working at all.The vast majority of au pairs come from the EU and the government's continued refusal to provide visas has been devastating for those of us who have for many years invested our time and energy in this valuable cultural and linguistic exchange.

We can only hope that someone in government eventually sees the folly in this and comes up with a solution - it really can't be that difficult.Dr Ruth CampbellStirlingIsolationismDespite Johnson's words about “our friends” and the cultural links with Europe, we have cancelled Erasmus, a wonderful, successful programme for the exchange of students.We have failed to providevisa-free travel for musicians to comeand go from Europe.We have failed to give immunity to diplomats from the European Union as we give to those from the sovereign states of Europe.

What is next on the list, in our desperate and petty drive to isolate us from all things European?It is pathetic and shows once again how hollow are those words from the PM.Robert MurrayNottinghamSpeedy startThe speed and determination with whichPresident Biden has started his term in office is so refreshingand absolutely necessary.The disastrous four years of Donald Trump's tenure has debilitated and divided the American people.
Joe Biden has homed in on the bigger picture and where there is real need for change.

Hopefully the administration he has chosen will work together to once again be able to lead America to a prosperous future and work for world peace.Many of his team have extensive credentials in their given roles, which bodes well for competency and success.

Biden seems to have homed in on major areas of concern that have been caused by Trump and his cavalier team of no-hopers.Taking a firm grip of Covid-19, global warming, education and business support ought to show the American people that he is serious about leading them out of this quagmire that has been left by Trump.With the skills he has honed as a vice president, and 30 years in various positions in government, I believe Biden can truly make a positive difference and, coupled with his statesmanlike approach, he can once again lead America on the world stage.

He will, I'm sure, seek peace with fractious countries instead of conflict.I wish Mr Biden all the luck and good wishes and look forward to him making good on his promises in the future.Keith PooleBasingstokeJab fearsOf course it is great to get needles into arms but, oh dear, can this government get anything right?
Only single doses have been given of the Pfizer vaccine,with warnings from the maker against delaying the provision of a second dose.I have had a single jab and I do not feel safe.
My careful life style will not change, not only as I suspect the efficacy, but if I contract the disease I may be infectious.
When I get my second dose after 10 weeks (reportedly 12, now) I still will not feel safe as nobody knows the effect of the delay.

I will not feel confident to hug my grandchildren and will still be in limbo.Robert MurrayNottinghamTrump take twoThere's a horrible threat in Mr Trump's words, “we'll be back in some form”.We know to our cost that viruses can mutate.Rosemary MathewCambridgeAmerican exampleWith the Biden-Harris inauguration truth and decency return to American politics.

How long do we wait for these qualities to cross the Atlantic?Richard GreenwoodBewdleyRead MoreSpanish border guards confiscate Nando's sauce under new Brexit rules£800m tax lost after Brexit as border checks relaxed to avoid queuesScottish fishing industry protests over Brexit trade deal at WhitehallBiden has already made major changes in the first hours of presidencyBiden 'faces uphill struggle' to restore abortion access around worldUp to Biden if he wants bust of Churchill in Oval Office, says Johnson

documents.result_message: Our detector is highly confident that the text is written entirely by a human.
documents.inputText: Please send your letters toletters@independent.co.ukThe latest handout is£23m to Britain’s shellfish industrywhose exports have become entangled inred tape.  No doubt, for the same reason, more of ourmoneywill be necessary to rescue the Northern Irish haulage industry among others.Boris Johnson’s pipe dream of a go-it-alone globalBritainhas similarities to the jingoism of another Tory prime minister,Benjamin Disraeli, who extended the “Empire of England” beyond what Britain could sustain. So it has changed from a 12-week maximum to 12-weeks minimum. And we still don't know if 12 weeks makes sense at all.David WatsonHenley-on-ThamesBrexit job lossesThe impact ofBrexiton the fishing industry and on meat producers has hit the headlines daily and perhaps the government is correct in insisting these are short-term issues, which will be fixed.Spare a thought for those of us who run au pair agencies. Our businesses ceased at 11pm on 31 December and we have gone from having busy, viable agencies to no possibility of working at all.The vast majority of au pairs come from the EU and the government’s continued refusal to provide visas has been devastating for those of us who have for many years invested our time and energy in this valuable cultural and linguistic exchange. Joe Biden has homed in on the bigger picture and where there is real need for change. Hopefully the administration he has chosen will work together to once again be able to lead America to a prosperous future and work for world peace.Many of his team have extensive credentials in their given roles, which bodes well for competency and success. Biden seems to have homed in on major areas of concern that have been caused by Trump and his cavalier team of no-hopers.Taking a firm grip of Covid-19, global warming, education and business support ought to show the American people that he is serious about leading them out of this quagmire that has been left by Trump.With the skills he has honed as a vice president, and 30 years in various positions in government, I believe Biden can truly make a positive difference and, coupled with his statesmanlike approach, he can once again lead America on the world stage. Only single doses have been given of the Pfizer vaccine,with warnings from the maker against delaying the provision of a second dose.I have had a single jab and I do not feel safe. The efficacy is disputed. My careful life style will not change, not only as I suspect the efficacy, but if I contract the disease I may be infectious. When I get my second dose after 10 weeks (reportedly 12, now) I still will not feel safe as nobody knows the effect of the delay. I will not feel confident to hug my grandchildren and will still be in limbo.Robert MurrayNottinghamTrump take twoThere’s a horrible threat in Mr Trump’s words, “we’ll be back in some form”.We know to our cost that viruses can mutate.Rosemary MathewCambridgeAmerican exampleWith the Biden-Harris inauguration truth and decency return to American politics.
